tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
****** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********** I was having extreme heavy bleeding due to fibroids and ovarian cyst. After visiting lot of other doctors, I got reference to Dr. Madhuri from a known person. Doctor explained the issue clearly.
Despite lot of complications, doctor performed the surgery with utmost care and I am very thankful for her.  She is very friendly and sensitive towards her patients. Its very easy to approach her through phone or messaging. I would recommend her any day to all my friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been dealing with Adenomyosis since past 11 years and suffering badly. Thanks to Dr. Madhuri Vidhyashankar for guiding me for a healthy life. she is very patient in listening to all the health issues and suggests the best out of it. Though mine was a very complicated surgery but she did it with utmost care. In case of any emergency, she definitely attends the call inspite of a busy schedule too. She gives a very cozy and positive vibes which will make a patient almost cured with her words. I strongly recommend doctor Madhuri. Tonnes of Thanks to Doctor Madhuri.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited for laparoscopic hysterectomy ( bulky utrus with adenomyosis)I had been suffering severe pain during periods.i can't able bare the pain, it is equal to almost labour pains .. for this problem I have consulted many doctors...but am not satisfied ...then finally I gone through different gynecology doctors profiles in the practo website, in that I selected most experienced and  expert in laproscopy gyneocolgy surgeon.. that is Dr madhuri vidhya shankar , she is very friendly.,she hears all  of us complications very patiently, and  explains pros and cons of the problem facing , clarifies every doubt with neat digram. After her explanation, I am able to take decesion with out any fear about the surgery, and it's happens within 2days, and it went very smoothly and successful .. I felt about her after surgery I can say she is very good expert laproscopic surgery, I am really very much thankful to madhuri mam... such a wonderful doctor..I liked her caring , friendly connectivity with patients...no words to express... Without much thinking we can consult Dr.madhuri mam for any Gynocology problems to consult..Coming to the hospital Apollo cradle nd childrens hospital, hospital maintenance good interms of caring the patients, all the staff are very friendly .. Finally i am happy to say that I have got treated with such a wonderful doctor nd very good staff.. I really thankful to all of them...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tubectomy/Tubal Ligation,Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Gynae Problems,Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery,
review: Dr. MADHURI is an wonderful Gynecologist she communicate with patients so friendly and she make us to understand so clearly what are we going through. I am well satisfied with her treatment and I recommend people for all your pregnancy and gynec problems *** ** *** **** ****** ****. ❤❤❤❤
She’s very good, Very friendly & patient to explain about the treatment, I would recommend her for any Gyneic related treatment

review:
She is down to earth,excellent doctor
She is asset to milann hospital
From last 6 months we are coming to millann,feel happy bt hospitality cost is more
The doctor will explain to us about our health issues  in a very friendly way as a result we will not be afraid of the surgery.
